fullText:
Powerful Lure

Prerequisite: Level 11, satyr, lure of enchantment racial power
Benefit: When you use lure of enchantment, you can slide the target up to 6 squares, instead of the normal distance, and you can slide it into hindering terrain.

Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 130.
